title: Tangled in Wisteria
description: Absolutely! J. Andrew Lockhart tells us in Tangled in Wisteria how this happened in his life. This story of his amazing victory is followed by a collection of his modern English versions of the Japanese poems of tanka, haiku, and senryu. Movingly written, these short poems reveal the beauty of the seasons of nature and of life.
author: J. Andrew Lockhart
